knowledgeTasks.name: FAQs
knowledgeTasks.description: This is used to make ontology

faqs.question: Is mobile banking available

alternateQuestions.question: can I avail banking services on my mobile

answer.text: Some banks have mobile apps for convenient banking on the go. For example, you may be able to deposit checks by taking pictures of them with your phone. You may want to read reviews of your bank's app to see what specific services are offered, since they can vary

faqs.question: What do I need to apply for a credit card

answer.text: Applying for a credit card is a simple, straightforward process that requires some basic information. Students will need the name and location of their school in addition to a social security number and primary address. For security purposes, you may need to know your mother's maiden name.

faqs.question: How do I get a credit card if I have no credit history

answer.text: There are plenty of options on the market for people with limited credit history. Shop around to find the card with the lowest APR and fees you can qualify for. If you are having trouble being approved for cards, consider a secured credit card that requires a security deposit or ask a parent to add you as an authorized user on his or her card.

faqs.question: What are instant approval credit cards

answer.text: Instant approval means you'll receive a quick answer to your application for a new credit card. Typically, only people with good to excellent credit scores are granted instant approval.

faqs.question: What should I do if my debit card is not working

answer.text: If you are unable to transact on your credit card, you may call our Customer Care between 7:00 a.m. and 9:00 p.m. from your registered mobile number.

faqs.question: How can I generate the PIN for my debit card

answer.text: You can generate the PIN using our online services, mobile or customer care.

faqs.question: What do I need to apply for a savings account

answer.text: For a new account,  you will need social security number current residential address,Email address, mobile number and co-applicant's personal information.

faqs.question: Do I need to keep a certain amount of money in my savings account

answer.text: Banks typically require an initial deposit to open accounts, and some banks require you to pay a fee if you don�t maintain a minimum or average balance in your account. Those fees also may be waived based on certain conditions

faqs.question: Can I access my savings account information online

answer.text: You may be able to check balances, transfer money, receive statements and pay bills online. If you don't have easy access to a branch, online banking can be very valuable. Make sure you know your online banking responsibilities and guarantees in the event someone fraudulently removes your funds through online services.

faqs.question: Does savings account pay me interest

answer.text: Generally, if checking accounts pay interest, the rate is very low. High-yield checking accounts offer higher interest but typically require higher balances. Savings accounts offer higher rates, but because the accounts are intended for saving, they are subject to different rules. Federal regulations, which apply to all banks, limit the number of withdrawals you can make from savings accounts each month, and some banks may charge for frequent savings withdrawals. It's a good idea to check your bank's deposit agreement and any disclosures to see what applies; you can do this while you�re looking at what interest rate the account may pay.

faqs.question: How can I open a current account

answer.text: Walk into any of the bank branches nearest to you to open a current account.

faqs.question: How do I group multiple current accounts

answer.text: Grouping means group of accounts coming together to maintain the aggregate balance. The same is treated as a group of accounts for the purposes of Minimum Account Balance (MAB) and free limits aggregation. We offer upto 50% Monthly Average Balance, Lifetime Business Debit card charges waiver in grouping platinum variant. Please visit the nearest Bank branch along with request letter signed as per Mode of Operation (MOP) on your entity letterhead along with Board Resolution/ Authorisation letter, wherever appropriate.

faqs.question: How can I find the minimum balance policy for current account

answer.text: The details regarding the terms & conditions and Monthly Average Balance/ service charges pertaining to the Current Account (based on the type of account you are holding) have been updated on our website

faqs.question: Can I foreclose or prepay my car loan

answer.text: We charge prepayment fee of 5% on the outstanding principal amount and the Goods and Service Tax will be charged as applicable on the pre-payment fee.

faqs.question: What is a pre-approved car loan

answer.text: Pre-approved Auto Loan is offered to our existing customers on the basis of the existing relationship with the bank. It is offered to selected customers. Customers having pre-approved offers are eligible for the loan amount and tenure as per the offer available.

faqs.question: How can I make a home loan application

answer.text: You could collect an application form from our nearest office or simply download it from our website and submit it yourself along with the supporting documents and the processing fee cheque at any bank office that is convenient to you. Alternatively you have the option to make an online application from anywhere in the world by clicking on Instant Home Loan on our website and also know your Home Loan eligibility instantly.

faqs.question: How do I repay a home loan

answer.text: For your convenience, banks offers various modes for repayment of the home loan. You may issue standing instructions to your banker to pay the installments through ECS (Electronic Clearing System), opt for direct deduction of monthly installments by your employer or issue post-dated cheques from your salary account.

faqs.question: what is a pre-approved home loan
faqs.label: what is a pre-approved home loan

answer.text: A pre-approved home loan is an in-principal approval for a loan given on the basis of your income, creditworthiness and financial position. Generally, pre-approved loans are taken prior to property selection.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to repay my personal loan

answer.text: For prepayment of your Personal Loan, please visit the nearest Bank Asset Servicing Branch.

faqs.question: What is a personal loan

alternateQuestions.question: what do you mean by personal loan

answer.text: A personal loan is a fixed amount of money borrowed at a fix rate and repaid over a fixed amount of time. You can get a personal loan from a bank, credit union or online lender.Personal loans can either be secured or unsecured. A secured personal loan requires some type of collateral.

faqs.question: what is a pre-approved personal loan
faqs.label: what is a pre-approved personal loan

answer.text: Pre-approved personal loans are instant loans that are disbursed to select customers. It requires minimum documentation and no collateral or security. All you need is a good credit history and repayment record to be eligible for the instant loan facility.
